T02D3696:328a-1: a'arya t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3696:328a-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3696:328a-4: dang po re zhig sngags pas kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas /
T02D3696:328b-0: byang chub mchog @328b tu sems bskyed la /
T02D3696:328b-1: rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i
T02D3696:328b-2: steng du yi ge t'am ljang gu 'od zer dang
T02D3696:328b-4: de'i 'od zer gyis ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas khams gsum du spros te /
T02D3696:328b-5: 'gro ba'i don byas nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sgrol ma spyan drangs te ;
T02D3696:328b-10: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3696:328b-11: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3696:328b-13: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa
T02D3696:328b-14: zhes bya ba bla na med pa'i yan lag bdun
T02D3696:328b-15: pa'i mchod pa byas nas byams pa la sogs pa
T02D3696:328b-16: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3696:328b-17: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko&amp ;
T02D3696:328b-19: zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags brjod cing thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3696:328b-20: de nas padma dang zla ba'i steng du t'am yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3696:328b-21: autpal sngon po t'am gis mtshan pa bsam de rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3696:328b-22: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D3696:328b-23: sku mdog ljang gu lang tsho dang ldan pa /
T02D3696:328b-24: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang ldan pa /
T02D3696:328b-25: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3696:328b-27: g-yon gyis autpal bsnams pa padma dang zla ba'i steng
T02D3696:328b-28: du g-yon bskum pa'i phyed skyil gyis bzhugs par bdag
T02D3696:328b-29: nyid bsgoms la / de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la
T02D3696:328b-30: dam tshig sems ma ji lta ba'i ye shes sems
T02D3696:328b-31: nyid bsgoms la / ma dang / de'i thugs ka'i
T02D3696:328b-32: zla ba la yi ge t'am ting nge 'dzin sems
T02D3696:328b-34: de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems ma spyan drangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D3696:328b-36: bdud rtsi lhag mas don yod grub pas spyi gtsug tu rgyas btab ste /
T02D3696:328b-37: 'od zer 'phros 'dus 'gro ba'i don mdzad par mi skyo'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3696:328b-38: skyo na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3696:328b-39: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3696:328b-40: zhes bya ba 'bum phrag bcu bzlas nas stong phrag bcus sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D3696:328b-41: 'gyur ba med par pha rol la //
T02D3696:328b-42: mi zad dga' bas bdud rtsi'i ros //
T02D3696:328b-43: srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad ma //
T02D3696:328b-44: sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3696:329a-1: bas bzlas pa'i rjes la bstod nas /
T02D3696:329a-2: yi ge brgya pa brjod de bsod nams bsngos la /
T02D3696:329a-3: aom badzra mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol /
T02D3696:329a-4: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbadharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'ata /
T02D3696:329a-5: aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya bas gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D3696:329a-6: zla ba drug gi bar du zhag re re zhing thun gsum du 'di dag bya'o //
T02D3696:329a-7: bla ma chen po sh'akya shr'i gha dras mdzad pa rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3696:329a-9: // / rgya gar shar phyogs dz'a ga ta la'i pandi
